statements: SELECT * FROM instruments_on_loan;
SELECT instrument_id, musician_id FROM instruments_on_loan;
SELECT loan_date, return_date FROM instruments_on_loan;
SELECT * FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT musician_id, loan_date FROM instruments_on_loan ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE musician_id = 1 ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT musician_id, loan_date, return_date FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT instrument_id, musician_id, loan_date FROM instruments_on_loan WHERE return_date IS NULL ORDER BY musician_id, instrument_id;
SELECT COUNT(instrument_id) AS total_instruments FROM instruments_on_loan GROUP BY musician_id ORDER BY total_instruments DESC;
SELECT musician_id, COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM instruments_on_loan GROUP BY musician_id HAVING total_loans > 2 ORDER BY total_loans DESC, musician_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, type FROM instruments WHERE is_on_loan = false;
SELECT name FROM instruments WHERE type = 'Guitar';
SELECT id, name FROM instruments ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE instrument_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, type FROM instruments WHERE is_on_loan = true AND type = 'Guitar' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, type, is_on_loan FROM instruments WHERE is_on_loan = false ORDER BY type, name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT musicians.name, instruments.name AS instrument_name FROM musicians JOIN instruments ON musicians.instrument_id = instruments.id WHERE instruments.type = 'Piano' AND musicians.id > 100 ORDER BY musicians.name ASC;

SELECT * FROM musicians LEFT JOIN instruments ON musicians.instrument_id = instruments.id WHERE musicians.instrument_id IS NULL AND musicians.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY musicians.name ASC, instruments.type DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_id DESC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_contact FROM musicians WHERE musician_id = 2;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Guitar';
SELECT loan_id, musician_id FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM loans JOIN musicians ON loans.musician_id = musicians.musician_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT musician_name, musician_contact FROM musicians WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM instruments WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT loan_id, instrument_name, musician_name, loan_date FROM loans JOIN instruments ON loans.instrument_id = instruments.instrument_id JOIN musicians ON loans.musician_id = musicians.musician_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Loan;
SELECT loan_id, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Loan WHERE loan_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT musician_id, musician_name FROM Musician ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM Instrument WHERE instrument_type = 'String';
SELECT loan_id, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Loan ORDER BY loan_start_date ASC, loan_end_date DESC;

SELECT l.loan_id, l.loan_start_date, l.loan_end_date, m.musician_name, i.instrument_name FROM Loan l LEFT JOIN Musician m ON l.musician_id = m.musician_id LEFT JOIN Instrument i ON l.instrument_id = i.instrument_id

SELECT m.musician_name, i.instrument_name, lh.loan_date, lh.return_date FROM Musician m JOIN LoanHistory lh ON m.musician_id = lh.musician_id JOIN Instrument i ON m.musician_instrument_id = i.instrument_id

SELECT l.loan_id, i.instrument_name, m.musician_name FROM Loan l JOIN Musician m ON l.musician_id = m.musician_id JOIN Instrument i ON l.instrument_id = i.instrument_id WHERE l.loan_start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT i.instrument_type, COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM Instrument i JOIN Loan l ON i.instrument_id = l.instrument_id GROUP BY i.instrument_type ORDER BY total_loans DESC
SELECT m.musician_name, COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM Musician m JOIN Loan l ON m.musician_id = l.musician_id GROUP BY m.musician_name HAVING total_loans > 2
SELECT * FROM Instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, loan_start_date FROM Loans;
SELECT musician_name, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Musicians JOIN Loans ON Loans.musician_id = Musicians.musician_id;
SELECT loan_id, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Loans WHERE loan_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, loaned_to_musician_id FROM Instruments WHERE loaned_to_musician_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Instruments WHERE loan_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT instrument_name, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Instruments WHERE loaned_to_musician_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT musician_name, instrument_name, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Musicians JOIN Instruments ON Musicians.musician_id = Instruments.loaned_to_musician_id;

SELECT loan_id, instrument_name, musician_name, location_name FROM Loans JOIN Musicians ON Loans.musician_id = Musicians.musician_id JOIN Instruments ON Loans.instrument_id = Instruments.instrument_id JOIN Locations ON Musicians.musician_contact = Locations.location_address;
SELECT * FROM LoanHistory WHERE loan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
